title: Multi-Factor Derived Key Policy Schema
description: A multi-factor derived key policy defines the factors and methods used to derive a key via multi-factor key derivation.

$schema.title: Key Schema
$schema.description: Link to the version of the schema that can validate the key policy.

$id.title: Key ID
$id.description: String which uniquely identifies this key.

threshold.title: Factor Threshold
threshold.description: The number of correct factors needed to derive this key.

size.title: Key Size
size.description: Size of key to derive (in bytes).

kdf.title: Key Derivation Function
kdf.description: Underlying KDF to use for key derivation.

type.title: KDF Type
type.description: Name of the key derivation function to use.

params.title: KDF Parameters
params.description: Parameters required by chosen key derivation function.

salt.title: KDF Salt
salt.description: Base-64 encoded salt value used as additional input to the KDF.

factors.title: Factors
factors.description: Factors which can be used to derive this key.

items.title: Factor
items.description: Factor which can be used to derive this key.

id.title: Factor ID
id.description: String which uniquely identifies this factor.

type.title: Factor Type
type.description: Name of the factor material function to use.

pad.title: Factor Pad
pad.description: Base-64 encoded intermediate value to combine with factor material.

params.title: Factor Parameters
params.description: Parameters required by chosen factor material function.
